text: Va ʙa tahqiq dar mijoni har millate pajomʙare firistodem, ki Allohro ʙiparasted va az toƣut duri cued. Ba'zero, ki Alloh hidojat kard, ki ilman va amalan pajravi pajomʙaron ʙudand va ʙar ʙa'ze gumrohi muqarrar gast, ki onon pajravi rohi gumrohi ʙudand. Pas, dar zamin ʙigarded va ʙined, ki oqiʙati kori kasone, ki pajomʙaronro ʙa duruƣ nisʙat medodand, ci guna ʙudaast
